name: VoiceofThings
0:
”Alexa, ask Voice of Things”
”Alexa, ask Voice of Things to locate the wheelchair”
”Alexa, ask Voice of Things to identify empty office desk”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice of things
des:
Voice of Things is a voice-to-anything skill for intelligent enterprises of tomorrow. You can conveniently use the contactless nature of voice AI to interact with your own enterprise network and IoT devices. The versatile platform works with existing Cisco, Juniper Mist, Meraki, and other popular corporate infrastructure components. 

Discover population count or density in any part of the corporate campus and ensure personal health and safety. Pinpoint the real-time location of high-value mobile assets supporting BLE/Wi-Fi/RFID communication protocols and never lose them. Smart IoT devices like sensors, switches, LEDs, etc., can also be intuitively voice-controlled using the unified voice interface. Users can leverage video analytics solutions to discover vacant desks, parking lots, etc. 

Try out the free skill with a sample backend dataset to feel how powerful the enterprise voice experience can be. Leverage the contactless and hygienic attribute of voice AI to accelerate enterprise innovation to a whole new level in a post-pandemic world. Deliver a superior, intuitive employee and customer voice experience without any hassles. 

Share your thoughts to talk@speaktoiot.com.
